records.Description: Member's brother was upset and stated that he was not told that, states that when they started the enrollment process he was told that the plan was like AARP or BCBS a supplemental plan.   I explained to the member's brother that we are Medicare Replacement plan. Member's brother Colin was very upset and states that they were not explained any of this and also asked about cancelling.
records.Subject: Grievance related to Sales

records.Description: Receiving care from Retina Associates and can't see out of eye  since middle of July. Doctor says it's too soon to tell.   Member is about to get another retina specialist because he needs to be able to see. He has blood in his eye from an injection with the doctor. Was not informed of side effects until injection was completed. He's seeing another doctor right now, and he's saying the same thing. He needs someone to do something about his eye.
records.Subject: Grievance related to retina specialist

records.Description: IB call from member stating he was having difficulty obtaining his prescribed medication of Myfortic-Mycophenolic acid, this medication is used to prevent organ rejection after transplant.  Member states pharmacy informed the member that the medication has been rejected by the insurance and is a Part B medication. Member became very angry after informing member the rejection was possible due to the medication being a immunosuppressant drug, which requires authorization from the provider. Member states the pharmacy called yesterday to run the prescription and were told that the medication was Part B covered and did not mention anything about a prior authorization, member states at the time if they were informed of that, member would have done the authorization. Member then continued to express his frustration stating this medication was extremely important to prevent his body rejecting his kidney that he waited years for.
records.Subject: Grievance related to Part B Drugs
